net.edudb.expression

Class LogicalOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.edudb.expression.LogicalOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EBBinaryNode, EBNode, BinaryExpressionNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ANDLogicalOperator, ORLogicalOperator

    public abstract class LogicalOperator
extends java.lang.Object
implements BinaryExpressionNode
    An operator, with two children, that evaluates its children expressions given a logical operator. For example, if an AND logical operator has two children expressions A and B where A is col = val and B is col > val, then the whole expression is evaluated as col = val AND col > val.

    Currently supported logical operators: AND and OR.
    Author:
    Ahmed Abdul Badie
